selections.name: Not A Sinner (gb)
selections.reason: Top Speed (119) and Class (107) figures in the field. Consistent turf sprinter with strong late kick potential.

selections.name: Hey Lil Lady
selections.reason: Matches top speed figure (119). Good post for the downhill turf course. Consistent form (87).

selections.name: Wildfire Princess
selections.reason: Solid speed (109) and form (89). Juan Hernandez aboard is a significant plus.

selections.name: Deep Blue
selections.reason: Speed (109) fits well here. Outside post allows for a clean stalking trip.

danger_horse.name: Hey Lil Lady
danger_horse.reason: Speed figures match the favorite; dangerous if allowed to dictate terms.

selections.name: Voldemort
selections.reason: Baffert/Hernandez combination. Speed (109) and Form (92) are solid. Should sit a perfect stalking trip.

selections.name: Theodore George
selections.reason: Highest recent speed figure (113). McCarthy/Prat connection commands respect.

selections.name: Cowboy Mike
selections.reason: Speed (109) is competitive. Rail draw dictates a forwardly placed trip.

selections.name: Clooney
selections.reason: Consistent runner (Speed 109). Glatt barn is dangerous.

danger_horse.name: Theodore George
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure advantage (113 vs 109) makes him a serious threat to the favorite.

selections.name: Romantic Ride
selections.reason: Standout Speed (111) and Class (115). 8/5 Morning Line reflects dominance in this field.

selections.name: Benny And The Jet

selections.name: Sirnami
selections.reason: Speed (105) puts him in the mix for minors.

selections.name: Debbies Gettinghot
selections.reason: Speed (102) is competitive for the lower rungs of the exotics.

selections.name: Broadway Unions
selections.reason: Top Speed (109) and Class (92). Outside post in a small field allows tactical versatility.

selections.name: Mighty Kai
selections.reason: Speed (108) is right there. Jaramillo/O'Neill team is potent. Rail draw is the main concern.

selections.name: Tee N Off
selections.reason: Speed (104) is a step below top two but capable of hitting the board.

selections.name: Cupid's Crusader
selections.reason: Speed (108) matches contenders, but form is slightly less consistent.

danger_horse.name: Mighty Kai
danger_horse.reason: If he breaks cleanly from the rail, he has the speed to wire this field.

selections.name: Castle Leoch
selections.reason: Highest Speed (120) in the field. 8/1 Morning Line offers massive value overlay.

selections.name: Cathal (ire)
selections.reason: Strong Speed (119). Espinoza/Knapp combo. Good post.

selections.name: Del Mar Jerry
selections.reason: Speed (115) is solid. Kimura/Miyadi. 5/2 Favorite is logical but offers less value.

selections.name: Phosphorescence (fr)
selections.reason: Speed (116). Prat/McCarthy team is always dangerous on turf.

danger_horse.name: Del Mar Jerry
danger_horse.reason: Consistent runner who will likely take money for a reason.

selections.name: Blame Eve
selections.reason: Top Speed (107) in the field. Juan Hernandez aboard. 3/1 is fair value.

selections.name: Thatsalrightmama
selections.reason: Speed (105) makes her a primary contender. McCarthy barn.

selections.name: Makenarita
selections.reason: Matches Speed (105). Kimura aboard.

selections.name: Greta's Ghost
selections.reason: Speed (99) is lower than top picks, but 5/2 ML suggests insider confidence or pace advantage.

danger_horse.name: Greta's Ghost
danger_horse.reason: Low odds despite lower figures suggests hidden form or pace advantage.

selections.name: Sorrento Sky (ire)
selections.reason: Field-best Speed (127). D'Amato/Kimura. This horse looks faster than the rest.

selections.name: Sumter
selections.reason: Speed (124) is elite. Mandella/Prat. The main danger.

selections.name: Flyover
selections.reason: Speed (124) matches Sumter. Sadler/Geroux. Must be respected.

selections.name: Yellow Card
selections.reason: Speed (121) is strong, but slightly below the top tier here.

danger_horse.name: Sumter
danger_horse.reason: Proven class and connections; rail draw could be tricky or advantageous depending on break.

selections.name: Explora

selections.name: Meaning
selections.reason: Matches Speed (112). McCarthy/Prat. The only logical upsetter.

selections.name: Super Corredora
selections.reason: Speed (105). Consistent but likely running for third.

selections.name: Bank Shot
selections.reason: Outclassed on figures (103).

selections.name: Balladeer

selections.name: Spycatcher
